customer_name: Keeper of the Wild Wildlife Rescue and Sanctuary
site_name: Keeper of the Wild Wildlife Rescue and Sanctuary

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:42pm on January
13, 2026. Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file, leaving
a voicemail message. While waiting, the licensee’s husband met the inspector in the driveway, stating the licensee was
not home to conduct an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:42pm on January 
13, 2026. Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file, leaving 
a voicemail message. While waiting, the licensee’s husband met the inspector in the driveway, stating the licensee was 
not home to conduct an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
